overview: Prison escapee Utah Evans kills Sheriff McClay. Joe Norton was McClay's predecessor and sent Utah to prison. Ma McClay having taken over as Sheriff for her husband, now gets Joe to return. Joe sets out to get Utah and Utah, learning Joe is after him, hopes to get revenge for being sent to prison.
tagline: BRONZED SONS OF THE WEST IN A SERIES OF PULSE-QUICKENING ADVENTURES!
title: Wild Mustang
